Package de.htwsaar.config

Class DynamicConfig

java.lang.Object
de.htwsaar.config.DynamicConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnvConfiguration
public class DynamicConfig extends Object implements EnvConfiguration
This class is intended to be use in Unit test as a Mock Object of EnvConfiguration.
Author:
hbui
